FFlagSelfieConsentDialogDontUsePortal.mechanism: Changes how the selfie consent dialog is displayed, avoiding the use of portals.
FFlagSelfieConsentDialogDontUsePortal.purpose: Provides a smoother experience for players when taking selfies in the game.

DFIntProductIdProductInfoCacheLifetimeSe.mechanism: Sets a time limit for how long product information is stored in cache.
DFIntProductIdProductInfoCacheLifetimeSe.purpose: Ensures players see the most up-to-date product info when filtering items in the game.

FFlagEnableAppChatFocusableFixes2.mechanism: Implements fixes to make chat features more responsive in the app.
FFlagEnableAppChatFocusableFixes2.purpose: Enhances communication between players by making chat easier to use.

FIntOcclusionSolverInitialMaxSearchItera.mechanism: Adjusts the maximum number of iterations for occlusion calculations in rendering.
FIntOcclusionSolverInitialMaxSearchItera.purpose: Improves performance by optimizing how objects are rendered based on visibility.

FFlagVideoEncoderScopedOutputBuffer.mechanism: Enables a more efficient video encoding process by using scoped output buffers.
FFlagVideoEncoderScopedOutputBuffer.purpose: Enhances video quality and reduces lag during gameplay recordings.

FFlagEnableAutomaticGainControlForAudioD.mechanism: Automatically adjusts audio input levels for better sound quality.
FFlagEnableAutomaticGainControlForAudioD.purpose: Ensures clearer voice chat by balancing volume levels from different players.

FFlagRemoveLeaveShortcutFromLeaveConfirm.mechanism: Removes the shortcut option for leaving a game from the confirmation dialog.
FFlagRemoveLeaveShortcutFromLeaveConfirm.purpose: Prevents accidental game exits by requiring players to confirm their choice more deliberately.

FFlagAddSwitchTabHintsToIEM2.mechanism: Adds hints for switching tabs in the interface.
FFlagAddSwitchTabHintsToIEM2.purpose: Helps players easily navigate between different sections of the game.

FFlagAXRemoveTryOnManagerAvatarScreen.mechanism: Removes the try-on feature from the avatar customization screen.
FFlagAXRemoveTryOnManagerAvatarScreen.purpose: Streamlines the avatar customization process for a smoother experience.

DFIntRobloxTelemetryLoadTestEndThrottleH.mechanism: Adjusts the load testing parameters for better performance monitoring.
DFIntRobloxTelemetryLoadTestEndThrottleH.purpose: Improves game stability and performance by optimizing how data is collected.

DFFlagISRDoNotCrashCanSkipNewInstanceChe.mechanism: Prevents crashes by allowing certain checks to be skipped if conditions are met.
DFFlagISRDoNotCrashCanSkipNewInstanceChe.purpose: Enhances game reliability by reducing the chances of unexpected crashes.

FFlagEnableSpatialUIScalingFix.mechanism: Fixes issues with how user interfaces scale in different spatial contexts.
FFlagEnableSpatialUIScalingFix.purpose: Ensures that UI elements are displayed correctly, improving the overall user experience.
